Parameters.description: Parameters for the UNEQUIP_CLOTHING operation, which removes equipped clothing items

entity_ref.description: Required. The entity to unequip clothing from.

clothing_item_id.description: Required. The ID of the clothing item to remove. Can be a placeholder like '{event.payload.targetId}'.

cascade_unequip.description: Optional. Whether to also unequip items in layers above the target item. Default: false.

destination.description: Optional. Where to place the unequipped item. Default: 'inventory'.
